name: EasyCook
0:
”Alexa open Easy Cook”
”Alexa start Easy Cook”
”Alexa launch Easy Cook”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: easy cook
des:
Welcome to the new Easy Cook skill for Amazon Alex designed to recommend you breakfast, lunch, dinner, or snacks recipes. Wether you are a novice to cooking or you have an experienced hand, Easy Cook recommends recipes that can be easily made.
Simply search by, 'breakfast', 'lunch', 'dinner', or snacks to get variety of healthy, and delicious recipes.
Easy Cook is your perfect cooking partner at your kitchen.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
